original_text: On the testimony of two or three witnesses a person is to be put to death, but no one is to be put to death on the testimony of only one witness.
korean_text: 죽일 자를 두 사람이나 세 사람의 증언으로 죽일 것이요 한 사람의 증언으로는 죽이지 말 것이며

sentences.original_text: On the testimony of two or three witnesses
a person is to be put to death
but no one is to be put to death
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 아무도 사형에 처해서는 안 된다

sentences.original_text: on the testimony of only one witness
